DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study look effect RN624 moderate severe knee pain due osteoarthritis . This study look safety pain relieve effect RN624 compare placebo 4 month period .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase II Study Looking Moderate Severe Osteoarthritis Knee Pain
DOC.criteria: Male nonpregnant female age 4075 chronic moderate severe knee pain due OA ( score 50 100 visual analog scale knee pain ) . Subjects must meet one follow : unwilling take nonopiate pain medication , nonopiate pain medication fail , candidate seek invasive intervention intraarticular injection , knee arthroplasty , total knee surgery History symptom autoimmune disorder , cancer within last 5 year except cutaneous basal cell squamous cell cancer resolve excision , allergic reaction monoclonal antibody IgGfusion protein , Hepatitis B , C HIV , drug abuse , fibromyalgia , clinically significant cardiac disease , diabetes mellitus require oral treatment insulin , clinically significant neurological disease clinically significant psychiatric disorder
